hero.title: Сrimean Project Foundation
hero.description1: We develop educational, media, and cultural initiatives for internally displaced persons from occupied territories and Crimean Tatars around the world.
hero.description2: We work for the future of Crimea and all of Ukraine. We take responsibility for the next generations.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Building bridges across Europe through the shared experience of educational mobility
mission.vision_text: A resilient civil society in Crimea and Ukraine that meets modern challenges and is ready for future change.
mission.values_text: To be open to new ideas, to seek unconventional solutions to complex issues, to rely on best practices, and to set precedents.
mission.mission_text: Intellectual development of the generation through innovative projects to strengthen society.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.intro: Here we present initiatives that empower youth, support communities, and strengthen cultural identity in Ukraine, Crimea, and across Europe.

news.title: Latest News
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest events and stories from our community.

media.info: an independent Crimean Tatar media outlet that speaks about Crimea as it really is.
media.info2: This is the voice of the peninsula that never falls silent. We work to bring Crimea back into the field of Ukrainian attention — and to keep it there permanently, despite the occupation.

members.title: Our Partners
members.subtitle: Strengthening civil society in Crimea and Ukraine by uniting educational institutions, cultural organizations, and youth communities committed to innovation, resilience, and future-oriented development.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our community, want to get involved, or need support? We’re here to help.

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.body: Your message has been sent. We’ll get back to you soon.

error.title: Failed to send
error.body: Please try again a bit later.

form.name: Full Name *
form.subject: Subject *
form.note: * Required fields. We usually respond within 24–48 business hours.
form.placeholder_message: Tell us more about your inquiry...

footer.description: is a project and educational platform working to strengthen cultural, professional and personal growth of residents, IDPs and citizens of Ukraine.
footer.funding_notice: Crimean project and educational platform Q-hub is a non-governmental organization founded by Crimean Tatar activists.
